subject: John lennon files
author: bhali333
full_text:
Hey guy's on a more positive note, I think a little of steve's mojo 
rubbed off on me. I recieved two messages from john lennon, Right 
before I was set to post them lisby quotes lennon in a post to me.

pretty cool

The first file #11 where he says John it sounds like him
the second #11A is a little rougher but understandable.

I posted them in the general files section, I'll only leave them till 
anyone who wants has had a chance to listen.

Bruce
